definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
student graduating in the current year/recent graduate

sentences.english: Grads get offers in grassroots-level schools teaching in Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 广东应届毕业生获得农村学校教书的就业机会。

sentences.english: This year's graduates with major in Automation Control or Electrical Engineering are also welcome.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎优秀的自动化控制或机电工程应届毕业生应聘。

sentences.english: Two thirds of these posts are open to fresh college grads.
sentences.chinese: 这些岗位中，三分之二是向大学应届毕业生开放的。

sentences.english: With so many college studentscoming out at a time, many graduates havedifficulties in finding suitable jobs.
sentences.chinese: 随着大学生相继毕业，许多应届生很难找到工作。

sentences.english: This year's graduates may inquire the list of recruiters at the students' affairs division.
sentences.chinese: 应届毕业生可以通过学生处查询招聘单位目录。

sentences.english: No working experience limited, experience of serving for student union is a plus.
sentences.chinese: 应届生亦可，最好有学生会工作的经历。

sentences.english: Welcome fresh men or under-graduates come to work with us…
sentences.chinese: 欢迎广大在读学生应届毕业生来我司兼职工作。

sentences.english: Students who have not yet graduated must submit their diplomas when they report to THU, otherwise, their admission will be canceled.
sentences.chinese: 应届毕业生须于录取报到时缴交，否则取销录取资格。
优秀的应届生亦可以考虑。

sentences.english: I am a student from Automotive College of Tongji University.
sentences.chinese: 我是同济大学汽车学院的应届生。

sentences.english: This question is one of the most tricky questions for fresh graduates.
sentences.chinese: 对于应届生应聘者来说，对这个问题是最易陷入圈套。

sentences.english: Game companies hiring straight out of college is also on the rise.
sentences.chinese: 游戏公司也在雇佣更多的应届生。

sentences.english: The sample consisted of 890 junior college graduates.
sentences.chinese: 研究对象为护理专科应届毕业生890人。

sentences.english: University graduate in architectonics , fresh graduate is permitted also.
sentences.chinese: 建筑学本科毕业，应届毕业生也可。

sentences.english: The interview of some small skills, is graduating job-seekers should know.
sentences.chinese: 其中面试的一些小技巧，是应届求职者不可不知的。

sentences.english: Recent college graduates who go into banking.
sentences.chinese: 应届毕业生总是爱在学校大耍花招。

definition: student graduating in the current year/recent graduate
vocational high school (abbr. to 職高|职高[zhi2 gao1])
horizontal line (in a fraction)/minimum passing score
a couple where both spouses are not Hong Kong citizens
to quit one's job (without having another one)
to add material to an exam/supplementary exam
